headline: Mizuho upgrades Eastman to ‘outperform’ as earnings outpace peers
summary: Investing.com -- Mizuho Securities upgraded Eastman Chemical (NYSE:EMN) Co to "Outperform" from "Neutral," citing stronger earnings momentum and a unique position in circular plastics. The firm set a price target of $105, which roughly implies an 18% upside.
